Title: Relates to the subsidies that may be provided to a parent who adopts a disabled or hard to place child
Summary: Authorizes the social services department to terminate the subsidies that may be provided to a parent who adopts a disabled or hard to place child under certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd ยง453, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the adoption subsidies provided for disabled or hard to place children
